snippet: LEVINE--Lillian. Congregation Rodeph Sholom is deeply saddened by the death of Lillian Levine, widow of the late Irving Levine and beloved mother of Robert N. Levine, our senior rabbi, and Scott and Sheree Levine. Lillian is survived by her daughters-in-law, Gina Stahl Levine and Alice Geller, her seven grandchildren, Judah, Ezra, Maya, Kate, Sarah, William and David. The funeral will be held in Springfield, MA, on Tuesday, January 19 at 11:30am at the Ascher-Zimmerman Funeral Home in Springfield, MA. Interment follows the service. Shiva reception will be held at Beth El Temple on Dickinson Street in Springfield from 2-5pm. We extend our deepest condolences to the entire family. Clergy, Board of Trustees, Staff and Members of Congregation Rodeph Sholom 1/3
